text: Va agar on goh ʙuʙinī, ki gunahkoronro dar nazdi Parvardigoraşon sarxam kardaand va megūjand: Ej Parvardigori mo, didem amalhoi ʙadamonro va şunidem on ciro, ki dar dunjo Rasulat ʙo mo mefarmud. Aknun moro ʙozgardon, ʙa dunjo to kori şoistae kunem, ki inak, ʙa jaqin rasidaem va on ciro, ki peş durūƣ meʙarovardem, aknun ʙa on ʙovar dorem
